input.name: video
input.help: Supported formats: FLV, MP4, M4A, MOV, MP4V, 3GP and 3G2

input.name: scale
input.help: If this option is selected the flash will be scaled to fill the available width in the region it is placed. Width and height settings will be used to preserve the width-height ratio.

input.name: image
input.help: The alternative image will be displayed when falsh is not supported.
